Column {data-width=550}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Noun Frequency (top 30)

```{r}
  noun_freq = read.csv("../data/noun_freq.csv")
  nounFreq_30 = noun_freq[(1:50),]
  
  ggplot(nounFreq_30, aes(x = reorder(lemma, n), y = n)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    coord_flip()
```
